oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The sorcerer !nuin|kuiten. In the Katkop dialect, by Dia!kwain (L V.-15. 5079-5101, 5104-5109). The sorcerer !nuin-|kui-ten becomes a lion and goes about just to look at people, not to hunt them. !nuin-|kui-ten teaches Dia!kwain's father his magic because he feels that he is about to die.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !nuin-|kui-ten (who was a sorcerer or magician)
